00032 #include "modules/meteo/wind_gfi.h"
00033 
00034 #include "mcu_periph/i2c.h"
00035 #include "led.h"
00036 #include "mcu_periph/uart.h"
00037 #include "messages.h"
00038 #include "downlink.h"
00039 
00040 struct i2c_transaction pcf_trans;
00041 
00042 #ifndef ZERO_OFFSET_DEGREES
00043 #define ZERO_OFFSET_DEGREES     45.
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 #ifndef PCF_I2C_DEV
00047 #define PCF_I2C_DEV i2c0
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 /* PCF8575 address can be set through A0..A2, starting at 0x40 */
00051 
00052 #ifndef PCF_SLAVE_ADDR
00053 #define PCF_SLAVE_ADDR 0x40
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 uint32_t pcf_direction;
00057 uint8_t  pcf_status;
00058 
00059 void wind_gfi_init(void) {
00060   pcf_trans.status = I2CTransDone;
00061   pcf_status = PCF_IDLE;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void wind_gfi_periodic( void ) {
00065   /* OE low, SEL high (for low data) */
00066   pcf_trans.buf[0] = 0xFF;
00067   pcf_trans.buf[1] = 0xBF;
00068   pcf_status = PCF_SET_OE_LSB;
00069   I2CTransmit(PCF_I2C_DEV, pcf_trans, PCF_SLAVE_ADDR, 2);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void wind_gfi_event( void ) {
00073   if (pcf_trans.status == I2CTransSuccess) {
00074 
00075     if (pcf_status == PCF_SET_OE_LSB) {
00076       pcf_status = PCF_READ_LSB;
00077       I2CReceive(PCF_I2C_DEV, pcf_trans, PCF_SLAVE_ADDR, 2);
00078     }
00079     else if (pcf_status == PCF_READ_LSB) {
00080       /* read lower byte direction info */
00081       pcf_direction = pcf_trans.buf[0];
00082 
00083       /* OE low, SEL low (for high data) */
00084       pcf_trans.buf[0] = 0xFF;
00085       pcf_trans.buf[1] = 0x3F;
00086       pcf_status = PCF_SET_OE_MSB;
00087       I2CTransmit(PCF_I2C_DEV, pcf_trans, PCF_SLAVE_ADDR, 2);
00088     }
00089     else if (pcf_status == PCF_SET_OE_MSB) {
00090       pcf_status = PCF_READ_MSB;
00091       I2CReceive(PCF_I2C_DEV, pcf_trans, PCF_SLAVE_ADDR, 2);
00092     }
00093     else if (pcf_status == PCF_READ_MSB) {
00094       float fpcf_direction;
00095 
00096       /* read higher byte direction info */
00097       pcf_direction |= pcf_trans.buf[0] << 8;
00098 
00099       /* OE high, SEL high */
00100       pcf_trans.buf[0] = 0xFF;
00101       pcf_trans.buf[1] = 0xFF;
00102       pcf_status = PCF_IDLE;
00103       I2CTransmit(PCF_I2C_DEV, pcf_trans, PCF_SLAVE_ADDR, 2);
00104 
00105       /* 2048 digits per 360 degrees */
00106       fpcf_direction = fmod((pcf_direction * (360./2048.)) + ZERO_OFFSET_DEGREES, 360.);
00107 
00108       DOWNLINK_SEND_TMP_STATUS(DefaultChannel, &pcf_direction, &fpcf_direction);
00109     }
00110     else if (pcf_status == PCF_IDLE) {
00111       pcf_trans.status = I2CTransDone;
00112     }
00113   }
00114 }
